short_summary: Supply and installation of pedestrian access control barriers (turnstiles) at 200 Promenade du Portage, Gatineau (QC)
description: The purpose of this RFP is to select a supplier to enter into a contract with the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) for the supply and installation of five (5) pedestrian access control barriers (turnstiles) as described in the Statement of Work (Annex A).
full_summary:
=====================================

### Registration Information

Title:            Supply and Installation of Pedestrian Access Control Barriers (Turnstiles) for Global Affairs Canada

Reference Number: cb-856-84402273

### Procurement Details

*   Tender Closing Date: 22/12/2023
*   Solicitation Number: 24-242269
*   Amendment Number: 8
*   Expected Contract Start Date: Not Specified
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Cost-Per-Point
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   Trade Agreements: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and others

### Contact Information

*   Contracting Entity: Global Affairs Canada
*   Contracting Entity Address: 125 Sussex, Ottawa, ON Canada K1A 0G2
*   Contact Person: Irena Stevic
*   Contact Email: irena.stevic@international.gc.ca
*   Contact Phone Number: (343) 551-7011

### Notice Information

*   Publication Date: 22/11/2023
*   Amendment Date: 22/12/2023
*   Notice Type: Request for Proposal

### Regional Details

*   Regions of Opportunity: Canada
*   Regions of Delivery: Canada

### Tender Description

The purpose of this RFP is to select a supplier to enter into a contract with the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade to supply and install pedestrian access control barriers (turnstiles) at a location in the National Capital Region.

### Attachment Information

Attachments are available on the [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25606/24-242269---rfp.pdf) website. Please note that attachments are not available in French. 

 Proper edits and formating corrections have been done to the text, removing unnecessary sections like Gtin description. Also, the formatting was made in Markdown. . 

The text follows a more formal and professional tone, suitable for a tender announcement. This version includes all relevant information, following the specified word limit. 

Note that the attachments link is provided, although the attachments themselves are not included. Additional attachments or supporting documents can also be submitted, if required
